turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order a drink from Peet's on 29th Street in Boulder, Colorado.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say peet's coffee at 29th street in boulder colorado?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you for confirming that. What kind of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a Havana cappuccino, size medium with soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: medium havana capuccino sounds good! what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me confirm your order: medium havana capuccino with soy milk. Is this correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. Your coffee will be ready for pickup in 20 minutes at peet's coffee at 29th street in boulder colorado.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to you via text message shortly.
